name: HEAD HOME
description:
Take control of our hero as it carries the symbol of it's victory through the jubilant streets of it's hometown! DON'T DROP IT!

Arrow Keys to Move. Press E to THROW / JOSTLE.

Also supports CONTROLLERS.

MAKE IT TO THE END OF THE PARADE.

Art by ANGUS DICK (@angusdick)

Sound & Music by DAVID FENN (@autotwitch)

Everything Else by MARK FOSTER (@ClawhammerMark)

Made in Unity.

We had a great time making it. Have a great time playing it!

This game was made in 40 hours for Jamchester, a big gamejam held in Manchester UK, the theme was "You already won".
